cleaned_text: | | | | | Experiments and Studies | | | Definition Aromatherapy is the practice of using essential oils (volatile aroma compounds from plants) for improving health and well-being. Because essential oils are highly concentrated they pose some safety concerns since they can irritate the skin when used undiluted.
